data.title: The Original Cast of "All My Children"
data.meta_description:
Here’s a list of characters who were part of the original cast of  All My Children,  when it debuted on January 5, 1970: 
Phoebe Tyler 
Charles Tyler 
Lincoln Tyler 
Ann Tyler 
Chuck Tyler 
Amy Tyler 
Kate Martin 
Joe M…
data.text:
Here’s a list of characters who were part of the original cast of All My Children, when it debuted on January 5, 1970:

Phoebe Tyler

Charles Tyler

Lincoln Tyler

Ann Tyler

Chuck Tyler

Amy Tyler

Kate Martin

Joe Martin

Jeff Martin

Tara Martin

Ruth Brent

Phil Brent

Mona Kane

Erica Kane

Nick Davis

Can anyone tell me how many characters from AMC’s very first year are still on the show today?

Quote AMC_Fan2008: Here's a list of characters who were part of the original cast of All My Children, when it debuted on January 5, 1970:

Phoebe Tyler

Charles Tyler

Lincoln Tyler

Ann Tyler

Chuck Tyler

Amy Tyler

Kate Martin

Joe Martin

Jeff Martin

Tara Martin

Ruth Brent

Phil Brent

Mona Kane

Erica Kane

Nick Davis

Can anyone tell me how many characters from AMC’s very first year are still on the show today?

Hey AMC_FAN. I don't think that is Right. I Do Know that Erica was out of High School before She Met Jeff Martin who had come from Stanford to Work at Pine Valley Hospital. Erica Met Jeff at A Dance. I Also Know that I was Watching Jeff's Trial and Philip and Tara and then They had Ann and Nick Talking on A Pay Phone. I think that Ann had been in A Car Accident and Nick went to Help Her. They had Not had Ann and Nick Before and I didn't know who these People were. This was in 1973 so Nick was Not one of the Original People. I think that we didn't know Ann or Lincoln and I think we found out that Phoebe was their Step Mother and Not Their Real Mother. I think that Phoebe was Charles Second Wife. Lincoln was in Seattle and then He came to Pine Valley. I think we found out that Chuck's Father was Killed I think in A Car Accident or Possibly A Plane Crash. Chuck is Phoebe's Grandson. I think the Original People were Erica, Phoebe, Joe, Ruth and Mona. All they have Left is Erica and Joe. Once in A While They have Lee Meriwether being Ruth, but Ruth was Originally Played by Mary Fickett. Jody
